block.p: TILLMAN--Harry, age 93, of Fort Lee, NJ and Aventura, FL. Distinguished Army Vet of WWII, Owner and Manager of Heritage L & M, NYC, A Founder of the New Synagogue of Fort Lee. Husband of Sylvia nee: Grossman and the late Sylvia nee: Resnikoff. Father of Loretta (Richard) Zenna, Alyce (William) Kravitz, Sylvia's children Susan (John) Orlove, and Stanley Terman. Brother of Hilda Rutkay. Grandfather of six. Religious Service Wednesday 10:30 AM at the New Synagogue of Fort Lee, corner of Whiteman and Center Ave. Interment at New Montefiore Cemetery, Farmingdale, NY. Services by Eden (888) 700EDEN
